DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate role allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplantation treatment NHL .
DOC.brief_title: High Dose Chemotherapy Allogeneic Hematopoietic Cell Transplant Non-Hodgkin 's Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: To determine safety toxicity regimen high dose chemotherapy allogeneic peripheral blood progenitor cell transplantation ; determine efficacy procedure follow clinical outcome quality life measure ; evaluate graft versus host disease incidence severity regimen .
DOC.criteria: Morphologically confirm relapsed nonHodgkin 's lymphoma Age : > 18 < 61 year age Signed informed consent Hepatic dysfunction define serum transaminase > 2.5X normal value Serum creatinine > 2 mg/dl creatinine clearance < 60 ml/min Diseases nonHodgkin 's lymphoma Prior bone marrow transplant procedure Severe psychological medical illness
